entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
